Description.Text: The third-largest of the United Arab Emirates, Sharjah is the only emirate with coastlines on both the Arabian Gulf and the Gulf of Oman. Visitors can admire majestic mosques and many heritage sites and museums, as well as shop at traditional markets (souks) and modern retail malls. A visit to Sharjah is incomplete without browsing the Central Souk, a major landmark famous for its many gold and jewelry dealers. Spend a charming holiday by strolling around lagoons and experiencing the natural beauty of Arabian deserts, Al Hajar Mountains, and beaches. The many attractions of Dubai are only 30 minutes away.

Sheraton Sharjah offers an exciting array of tastes to suit every palate. Start your day with a Sheraton breakfast at Gusti, which then transforms into a casual contemporary Italian dinner venue. Throughout the day Al Qubtan at the beach beckons with popular grilled classics whilst the pool bar will ensure you stay hydrated. Be spoilt for choice at dinner. We are proud to present Saba, the first truly Emirati restaurant in the emirate with regional specialties in an indoor as well as al fresco setting, whilst the Seafood Market restaurant serves the freshest Gulf and other seafood from the market stalls located right inside the restaurant. For the moments in between and to connect with friends and family the Link@Sheraton Cafe is the perfect venue. Al Mahattah Cigar & Coffee Lounge is the elegant venue for pre or post dinner relaxation or to savor an aromatic cigar whilst watching the sun set in the Gulf.

Twin (Superior Deluxe Sea View Guest room 2 Double)

Message.Text:
Essential Information:
Please note: For Dynamic bookings only: Please note that if the rate is inclusive of breakfast, this will only be provided for a maximum number of 2 guests regardless of how many guests are confirmed for the room. Additional guests will have to pay for the breakfast charge directly to the hotel. Please be advised that if booking for 3 or more guests, there is an extra person fee not included in the rate and this is to be paid directly to the hotel on arrival. Please be informed that all the guests staying during New Year, there is New Year's Eve gala dinner for all guests staying over the night of 31 December 2019 will be included in the room rate upto two adults, however the charges for a child between 6 and 11.99 yrs is not included and will have to be paid by the guest directly at the hotel at the time of Check-in. Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.
